items.title: Trump-Xi Talks Spark Market Optimism | Bloomberg: The China Show 1/20/2025
items.author: Bloomberg Television
items.content:
<article>“Bloomberg: The China Show” is your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. From politics and policy to tech and trends, David Ingles and Annabelle Droulers give global investors unique insight, delivering in-depth discussions with the newsmakers who matter.

Chapters:
00:00:01 - Bloomberg: The China Show begins
00:01:03 - Breaking: China's loan prime rates kept unchanged
00:02:48 - What to watch in China today
00:03:38 - Trump says 'American decline' to end; TikTok US restores service
00:15:10 - Market outlook with EFG Asset Management's Mozamil Afzal

00:34:58 - iMpact CEO Chris Pereira on how Chinese companies can navigate Trump's policies

00:59:30 - Trump memecoin rattles crypto market

items.title: Key Takeaways From Trump's Inauguration Eve Speech
items.author: Bloomberg Television
items.content:
<article>Speaking at a rally in Washington on Sunday night, Donald Trump said the US will "begin a brand new day of American strength and prosperity, dignity and pride." The president-elect reiterated his plans for a flurry of executive actions on his first day, including restoring borders, transparency, and accountability to government. Derek Wallbank reports on Bloomberg Television.
--------

items.title: Will TikTok keep running in the US? #trump #bloomberg #socialmedia
items.author: Bloomberg Television
items.content: <article>TikTok restored service to its app in the US on Sunday with some help from President-elect Donald Trump, who's pledged to extend a deadline to sell the company once he takes office. But it won't be so simple, as Alexandra Levine explains.</article>

items.title: President-Elect Trump Recounts 2024 Election Success
items.author: Bloomberg Television
items.content:
<article>President-Elect Trump took a final pre-inguration victory lap at the "Make America Great Again Victory Rally" at Capital One Arena  in Washington, D.C. He said the 2024 election is the “Most epic political victory our country has ever seen.”
--------

items.title: Africa Economic Outlook: Trump Effect, Currency Moves, Growth Picture
items.author: Bloomberg Television
items.content:
<article>The IMF has raised its growth forecast for sub-Saharan Africa to 4.2% this year, the highest since 2021. But Africa's markets enter the new year with a series of known headwinds to consider, from Donald Trump's proposed policies to the impact of China's economic struggles. So what will define the economic picture? Citi's chief Africa economist David Cowan discusses the outlook with Bloomberg's Jennifer Zabasajja.
--------
